name: Format\Image
description: The component for displaying JPEG, PNG, or GIF images.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: The URL of an image file.

properties.name: accessibilityCaption
properties.description: A caption that describes the image. Note that this property differs from caption: although the caption can be displayed to users, the accessibilityCaption is used by VoiceOver for iOS only. If accessibilityCaption is not provided the caption value is used for VoiceOver for iOS.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of ComponentLink objects. This can be used to create a ComponentLink, allowing a link to anywhere in News.

properties.name: caption
properties.description: A caption that describes the image. This text can be used by VoiceOver for iOS (compare accessibilityCaption). It will not appear in the main article view. To display a caption in the main article view, use a Caption component.

properties.name: explicitContent
properties.description: Indicates that the image may contain explicit content.
